It is a nutritional supplement with health benefits. Vitamin D is important for the absorption of calcium in the body through the gut thus helping in bone growth and reducing inflammation. Vitamin D is produced within the body when sun rays (UV rays) strike the skin. It is known as the 'sunshine vitamin'. Low levels of Vitamin D cause weakness, fatigue, and fragile bones. DV 60k Capsule is a fat-soluble vitamin and is consumed with meals for enhanced absorption in the body. Take the medicine as prescribed by the doctor. Precautions and Warnings of Dv 60000 IU Other General Warnings Talk to your doctor if - You have a medical condition like diabetes, hypertension, kidney or liver problem. - You are taking medications, supplements or following complementary or integrative health approaches. - You must not take the supplement if you are allergic to the components of the supplement. - You have a planned surgery or operation. You may have to stop taking these products at least 2 - 3 weeks ahead of the procedure. - Dietary supplements are intended to supplement the diets of some people and must not be a substitute for a well-balanced, varied diet and a healthy lifestyle. Ingredients and Benefits of Dv 60000 IU - Vitamin D3 is used in the absorption of calcium and phosphorus from the intestine, which is for the formation, growth and regeneration of bones. It supports healthy bones and teeth. - It is used in cell growth, neuromuscular, immune function and to reduce inflammation. - If you do not get enough vitamin D, you experience fractures, muscle pain and weakness. - Adequate levels of vitamin D in the body prevents rickets in children and bone softening in adults and the elderly. Directions for Use of Dv 60000 IU Take DV 60k Capsule as advised by the doctor. You must not consume vitamin supplements more than the stated daily dose. Content Details WRITTEN BY Dr. Mansi Savla B. Pharm, PharmD REVIEWED BY (Pharmacology) Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q: Which foods should I consume for vitamin D? - Food like cod liver oil, cheese, egg yolk, etc also Vitamin D is also formed under the skin when we are exposed to the sun. Sun exposure from 10 am to 3 pm at least twice a week for 10-30 minutes helps to prevent vitamin deficiency.... Q: Why it is important to take vitamin D? A: Due to our diet and lifestyle, we are based indoors in air-conditioned offices, houses and cars with less exposure to the sun. It leads to an increase in vitamin D deficiency in all age groups and fractures and muscle weakness. The research suggests that vitamin D may prevent the onset of diabetes, cancers like colon, breast and helps to build immunity. Q: Is DV 60k Capsule a health supplement? Can it be harmful if I take in excess? A: Yes, taking in excess DV 60k Capsule is harmful. An overdose causes stomach discomforts and increases calcium levels in the body. If you have taken too much of the supplement, seek medical help. Q: Can I take DV 60k Capsule if I am pregnant? A: DV 60k Capsule must be taken under medical supervision by a pregnant woman. High doses of Vitamin D must be avoided in pregnancy. Q: Why does vitamin D deficiency occur? A: Vitamin D deficiency occurs due to inadequate dietary intake, increased requirement and impaired absorption by the body. It happens due to limited exposure to sunlight, the inability of kidneys to convert vitamin D into active form and poor absorption from the intestine. It is common among individuals allergic to milk products, lactose intolerant and following diet like ovo-vegetarianism and veganism. Q: Can I take DV 60k Capsule daily? A: DV 60k Capsule is a high dose of vitamin D and not meant for daily consumption. It must be taken once a week for a few weeks as advised by the doctor. Q: What are the substitutes of DV 60K? A: Different brands have the same ingredient as DV 60K has. However, it is advised to take the same brand as prescribed by the doctor. Q: Is there any side effect of DV 60 K? A: Dv 60k usually has no side effects if taken in the recommended dose. However, sometimes you may experience nausea, constipation, vomiting, muscle or bone pain, etc. If you feel such symptoms for prolong time, immediately contact your doctor. Q: What is the composition of DV 60k? A: The composition of DV 60 K consists of vitamin D3, also known as cholecalciferol. Q: What are Dv 60k tablet uses? A: Dv 60 k tablet uses are to treat and prevent osteoporosis and bone disorders. It is used for vitamin D and calcium deficiency. It is used as a supplement when vitamin D requirements of the body are high in the elderly, after surgery and in growing children.
